p: Isocaryophyllene and b-caryophyllene, which are dominating constituents of the previously investigated essential oil from one population of S. officinalis in Montenegro [ 16], were totally absent in that from a population in Serbia, with germacrene D being the main compound [ 17]. Another study conducted in Serbia also confirmed sesquiterpene hydrocarbons as being the main fraction and identified germacrene D, β-caryophyllene, and α-humulene as the main constituents [ 18].
